headline.main: More Votes Than Voters in Many Detroit Precincts: Newspaper
headline.print_headline: More Votes Than Voters in Many Detroit Precincts: Newspaper

docs.snippet: Numerous voting machines in heavily Democratic Detroit showed a greater number of ballots than poll workers records said were  cast in the Nov. 8 presidential election, the Detroit News reported on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Numerous voting machines in heavily Democratic Detroit showed a greater number of ballots than poll workers records said were  cast in the Nov. 8 presidential election, the Detroit News reported on Tuesday.

headline.main: At Tavo, Mexican With Stops Around the World

docs.snippet: Other restaurant news includes a move for Charlie Palmer Steak and roast goose dinners around the city....
docs.abstract: Restaurants Tavo, Allora Ristorante, Coffeemania, La Barrita, Lady's, La Esquina Midtown West, Tim Ho Wan and Yama Ramen open in New York.
docs.lead_paragraph: Other restaurant news includes a move for Charlie Palmer Steak and roast goose dinners around the city.

headline.main: Police Kill Unarmed Man, 73, Who They Thought Had Gun
headline.print_headline: Police Kill Unarmed Man, 73, Who They Thought Had Gun

docs.snippet: An unarmed 73-year-old man refused to take his hand out of his pocket and stop walking toward officers who believed he had a gun when they fatally shot him, the incoming police chief of Bakersfield, California, said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An unarmed 73-year-old man refused to take his hand out of his pocket and stop walking toward officers who believed he had a gun when they fatally shot him, the incoming police chief of Bakersfield, California, said Tuesday.

headline.main: Engineer: Sand Dunes Would Create Massive, Dangerous Pond
headline.print_headline: Engineer: Sand Dunes Would Create Massive, Dangerous Pond

docs.snippet: A civil engineer testified in federal court Tuesday that beachgoers at a New Jersey shore town would have to cross a massive pond of murky water if protective sand dunes are built, but federal and state environmental regulators say those claims ar...
docs.lead_paragraph: A civil engineer testified in federal court Tuesday that beachgoers at a New Jersey shore town would have to cross a massive pond of murky water if protective sand dunes are built, but federal and state environmental regulators say those claims are exaggerated.

headline.main: Rio Darling Oleksiak Named Canada's Athlete of the Year
headline.print_headline: Rio Darling Oleksiak Named Canada's Athlete of the Year

docs.snippet: Olympic swimming sensation Penny Oleksiak won the Lou Marsh Trophy as Canada's top athlete of the year on Tuesday, capping off a remarkable year in which the 16-year-old won four medals at the Rio Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympic swimming sensation Penny Oleksiak won the Lou Marsh Trophy as Canada's top athlete of the year on Tuesday, capping off a remarkable year in which the 16-year-old won four medals at the Rio Games.

headline.main: No Sound of Bombardment in Aleppo for Past Hour: Reuters Reporter
headline.print_headline: No Sound of Bombardment in Aleppo for Past Hour: Reuters Reporter

docs.snippet: The sound of bombardment in the Syrian city of Aleppo had stopped late on Tuesday for more than an hour after a ceasefire deal was reached, a Reuters reporter said, apparently signaling an end of fighting....
docs.lead_paragraph: The sound of bombardment in the Syrian city of Aleppo had stopped late on Tuesday for more than an hour after a ceasefire deal was reached, a Reuters reporter said, apparently signaling an end of fighting.

headline.main: The Faces in Donald Trump’s Cabinet
headline.print_headline: The Faces in Donald Trump’s Cabinet

docs.snippet: Writers are mostly critical of the choice of an oil executive with no diplomatic experience for secretary of state....
docs.lead_paragraph: Writers are mostly critical of the choice of an oil executive with no diplomatic experience for secretary of state.

headline.main: Tiger Woods Returning to Riviera Country Club
headline.print_headline: Tiger Woods Returning to Riviera Country Club

docs.snippet: Tiger Woods is returning to Riviera Country Club for the first time since 2006 to play the Genesis Open in February....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods is returning to Riviera Country Club for the first time since 2006 to play the Genesis Open in February.

headline.main: U.S. Says It Has Seen Aleppo Ceasefire Reports, Cannot Confirm Them
headline.print_headline: U.S. Says It Has Seen Aleppo Ceasefire Reports, Cannot Confirm Them

docs.snippet: The U.S. State Department said on Tuesday it had seen reports of a ceasefire for the besieged Syrian city of Aleppo brokered by Turkey and Russia and would welcome that development if it led to a halt in bombing and allowed people to leave the are...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department said on Tuesday it had seen reports of a ceasefire for the besieged Syrian city of Aleppo brokered by Turkey and Russia and would welcome that development if it led to a halt in bombing and allowed people to leave the area.

headline.main: Attorney General Lynch Talks to Students About LGBT Issues
headline.print_headline: Attorney General Lynch Talks to Students About LGBT Issues

docs.snippet: U.S. Attorney General Loretta Lynch has praised New York City students for standing up for issues affecting lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Attorney General Loretta Lynch has praised New York City students for standing up for issues affecting lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people.
